projects.name: Personal Financial Dashboard
projects.description: personal financial dashboard for tracking, monitoring and analyzing my transaction to plan spending & investment by financial goals.

process.name: Scrape transaction from various sources (In my case, for example, Google Sheets, Notion, Airtable.).
Specify the date and clean unused transaction (unclassified and duplicate transactions).
Make a dashboard to visualize and monitor my cashflow.

key_findings.name: Proportion between necessary expenses and unnecessary expenses in 2023 is 63.6 - 36.4%.
71.3% of unnecessary expenses come from spending on certain types of entertainment which asked permission not to mention this name.
Income in July and October was unusually low

recommendation.name: Check transaction data in July and October to see if there were any missing data entries. (July and October received normal salary)
Reduce unnecessary expenses come from some of entertainment types by at least 20%
Take the expenses that were cut according to the above and add 15% to the emergency fund and 5% to the investment budget
